question: The first rule of the fictional Fight Club is you do not talk about Fight Club. What is the second rule of Fight Club?
correct_answer: You DO NOT talk about Fight Club
incorrect_answers: Only two guys to a fight
If its your first night at Fight Club, you have to fight.
